page.title: 12LOCAL PEOPLE OF WITLEY
page.content: {The White Hart. }The owner of the White Hart is Daphne Terry.She has been there 12 years but the actual building is 900 years old.They sell full meals and snacks and their brewer is The Phoenix Brewery.Their busiest days are over the weekend and they can seat 100 people. {Mr.Brabon's butchers shop}is in Witley on the Petworth Road.His customers come from around the village.His most regular customer is called Mrs Jeavons. He mostly sells meat and vegetables. {Alf Hammond }sells spare parts for cars.They get their parts from suppliers and second hand parts from the yard at Hambledon.The shop has 6 rooms.Two people work in the shop.It used to be the main shop in the village called the Co-Operative Stores.
